name: Duffel Crab
description: The Duffel Crab is a large monstrosity with a shell that operates like a bag of holding, capable of trapping and holding multiple creatures inside.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate extradimensional space and capture prey makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To capture prey and ambush unsuspecting creatures.
relations: May be found alongside other sea creatures or in aquatic environments.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and constitution make it a tough combatant.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma hinder its tactical abilities.
attacks: Can use claw attacks to grapple and deal bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Extradimensional Bag allows it to trap creatures and hold them in a bag-like space.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
additional_information: Grappled targets are blinded and restrained.
Multiattack feature allows for flexibility in combat.
False Appearance ability makes it appear as an ordinary bag when motionless.
Creature can survive a limited time inside the extradimensional space.
Upon death or damage to the bag, contents spill out rather than being lost.
test_queries: large crab that can trap creatures
aquatic monster that acts like a bag
creature that grapples and holds prey
formidable crab that ambushes in water
